column1: # List of public mass shootings from the beginning of the federal assault weapons ban
# Inclusion in the data set requires that at least four people be killed in public

column2: and the incident was not associated with criminal activity or self-defense
we include some events that do not meet this criteria that have

column1: # been included in other past compilations of public mass shootings.  However
# flag such events in the meet_inclusion_criteria field.
# This dataset can be freely used and shared
column2: as long as the header information

column1: # remains intact and the source and author are properly cited.

column15: summary
column16: reason_excluded

column15: Perpetrator killed 12 and wounded 1 in a nightclub.  A high-capacity semi-automatic pistol was used
Perpetrator killed 11 and wounded 6 in a synagogue. A high-capacity semi-automatic rifle and two high-capacity semi-automatic pistols were among the weaponry used.
Perpetrator broke into a newsroom, killing 5 and wounding 2
Perpetrator opened fire in a classroom at his high school, killing 10 and wounding 13
Perpetrator opened fire at a waffle house, killing four and injuring two. A high-capacity semi-automatic rifle was used
The perpetrator, a recently expelled student, opened fire at a school, killing 17 and wounding 14 others. A high-capacity semi-automatic rifle was used.
The perpetrator opened fire at a carwash, killing his ex-girlfriend and three acquaintances in a vehicle and the parking lot. A high-capacity semi-automatic rifle was among the weaponry used.
The perpetrator opened fire at a church, killing 26 and injuring 20. A high-capacity semi-automatic rifle was used.
The perpetrator opened fire at a concert, killing 58, and wounding 422. High-capacity semi-automatic rifles were used.
Perpetrator opened fire at his workplace, killing five co-workers. A high-capacity semi-automatic pistol was used
Perpetrator opened fire at a the bank where his estranged wife worked, killing four. A high-capacity semi-automatic pistol was among the weaponry used.
Perpetrator opened fire after a super bowl party at a club, after a verbal altercation, killing four.
The perpetrator opened fire at the Fort Lauderdale airport, killing five and wounding six.
The perpetrator opened fire at a mall, killing five. A rifle with a high-capacity magazine was used.

The perpetrator opened fire on police at a Black Lives Matter event, killing five and wounding 11. A high-capacity semi-automatic rifle and a high-capacity semi-automatic pistol were among the weaponry used.
The perpetrator opened fire at a nightclub, killing 49, and injuring 53. A high-capacity semi-automatic rifle and a high-capacity semi-automatic pistol were used.
The perpetrator, an Uber driver, shot at people between picking up clients, killing six and wounding two.  Two high-capacity semi-automatic pistols were used.
The perpetrators opened fire on co-workers at an office party, killing 14 and wounding 21. Two high-capacity semi-automatic rifles were among the weaponry used.

The perpetrator opened fire on his writing class at the college, killing nine, and wounding nine more.  A high-capacity semi-automatic rifle and three high-capacity semi-automatic pistols were found in the weaponry.

The perpetrator opened fire at a military recruiting center from the parking lot, wounding a marine. He then drove to US Navy reserve center, where he killed five and wounded one more. A high-capacity semi-automatic rifle and a high-capacity Saiga 12 shotgun were among the weaponry used.
Perpetrator opened fire at a church, killing nine and wounding one. A high-capacity semi-automatic pistol was used.
Perpetator opened fire at his school, killing five and wounding one.
Perpetrator opened fire at Cedarville Rancheria tribal offices and community center, kiling four and wounding two.
Perpetrator opened fire at the Washing DC Navy yard, killing 12 and wounding eight.  A high-capacity semi-automatic pistol was among the weaponry used.
The perpetrator shot six people in neighboring towns, killing two in a barbershop and two at a car care business, before being killed by officers in a shootout after a nearly 19-hour standoff.

The perpetrator shot his mother dead at their home then drove to Sandy Hook Elementary school. He forced his way inside and opened fire, killing 20 children. A high-capacity semi-automatic rifle and two high-capacity semi-automatic pistols were used.
The perpetrator, upon learning he was being fired, went on a shooting rampage, killing the business owner, three fellow employees, and a UPS driver.  A high-capacity semi-automatic pistol was used.
The perpetrator opened fire in a Sikh gurdwara, killing six and injuring three.  A high-capacity semi-automatic pistol was used.
Perpetrator opened fire in a movie theater, killing 12 and wounding 58 others.  A high-capacity semi-automatic rifle and two high-capacity semi-automatic pistols were among the weaponry used.
The perpetrator gunned down four people at a cafe and wounding another, and killed another person during a carjacking nearby.  A high-capacity semi-automatic pistol was used.
The perpetrator, a former student at the college, opened fire in a nursing classroom, killing seven and injuring three.
Perpetrator entered a spa, shooting and killing four family members.
Perpetrator opened fire inside a hair salon where his ex-wife worked, killing eight and injuring one.  A high-capacity semi-automatic handgun was used.
Perpetrator opened fire at an International House of Pancakes restaurant, killing four and injuring seven.  A high-capacity semi-automatic rifle was used.
The perpetrator opened fire at a birthday party in a roller rink, killing five and wounding four.

Perpetrator opened fire in a supermarket parking lot where Congresswoman Gabrielle Giffords was meeting with constituents, killing six and injuring 13.  A high-capacity semi-automatic pistol was used.
Perpetrator opened fire at his work place, killing eight and injuring two. Two high-capacity semi-automatic pistols were used.
Perpetrator opened fire at a restaurant, killing four and wounding three.
Perpetrator opened fire on police as a coffee shop, killing four. Two high-capacity semi-automatic pistols were used.
Perpetrator opened fire at Fort Hood, killing 13 and injuring 32.  A high-capacity semi-automatic pistol was used.
The perpetrator opened fire outside a store, killing four. A high-capacity semi-automatic rifle was used.
Perpetrator opened fire at a civic association center, killing 13 and injuring four.  A high-capacity semi-automatic pistol was used.
Perpetrator opened fire at a nursing home where his estranged wife worked, killing eight and injuring two.
Perpetrator opened fire at his workplace, killing five and injuring one.
Perpetrator killed a family member, two co-workers, and a customer at a salvage yard.
Perpetrator opened fire in a lecture hall, killing five and injuring 17.  A high-capacity semi-automatic pistol was among the weaponry used.
Perpetrator opened fire at a city council meeting, killing five and injuring two.  A high-capacity semi-automatic pistol was among the weaponry used.

Perpetrator opened fire at the Youth with a Mission building, killing two and wounding two.  Later that day, opened fire at New Life Church, killing two more and wounding three. A high-capacity semi-automatic rifle and a high-capacity semi-automatic pistol were among the weaponry used.
Perpetrator opened fire at a mall, killing eight and injuring four. A high-capacity semi-automatic rifle was used.
Perpetrator opened fire at the university, killing 32 and injuring 17.  Also had killed two in a private dorm earlier. A high-capacity semi-automatic pistol was among the weaponry used.
Perpetrator opened fire at a shopping center, killing five and injuring four. A pistol grip shotgun with greater than five round capacity was used.
Perpetrator opened fire at a school house, killing five and injuring five more.  A high-capacity semi-automatic pistol was among the weaponry used.
Perpetrator shot and killed four inlaws and wounded another in a church, then killed his wife in a parking lot.
Perpetrator opened fire at her workplace, killing seven co-workers. Had also killed a neighbor in their home earlier.  A high-capacity semi-automatic pistol was used.
Perpetrator shot killed two people in front of a church after a verbal altercation, then drove away, shooting two more people.

Perpetrator murdered his grandfather, who was a police officer, and grandfathers girlfriend. Weise then drove his grandfathers squad car to Red Lake Senior High School and opened fire on the reservation campus, killing another seven people, and wounding five. Had also shot his grandfather and his companion in their home earlier.  A high-capacity semi-automatic pistol was among the weaponry used.
Perpetrator opened fire at a meeting of his church congregation, killing seven and wounding four.  A high-capacity semi-automatic pistol was used.
The perpetrator gunned down former Pantera guitarist Dimebag Darrell and three others at a concert, wounding seven more.
Perpetrator shot five co-workers at a meat packing plant, and wounded two others.
The perpetrator shot his ex-girlfriend and three other people in a bar after a verbal altercation.
The perpetrator shot and killed six co-workers at an auto parts warehouse.
The perpetrator opened fire at his Lockheed Martin workplace, killing six co-workers and wounding eight.
The perpetrator killed four co-workers and wounded two others at an aircraft parts manufacturing plant.

The perpetrator killed his girlfriend and four former co-workers in several locations, and wounded a police officer and a passing motorist. Also killed supervisor in his home. Two high-capacity semi-automatic rifles were among the weaponry used.
The perpetrator opened fire at his former Navistar workplace, killing five and wounding four.  A high-capacity semi-automatic rifle was among the weaponry used.
The perpetrator killed his wife at their store, then went to another market and killed three people who worked there.
The perpetrator opened fire on co-workers at Edgewater Technology, killing seven.  A high-capacity semi-automatic rifle was among the weaponry used.
The perpetrator shot people at several locations including a store and a restaurant, killing four and wounding one. Also shot neighbor in their home earlier in the day.
The perpetrator gunned down four co-workers at the Radisson Bay Harbor Inn before killing a woman outside who refused to give him her car. Three others were wounded.
The perpetrator opened fire at his workplace, killing seven.  A high-capacity semi-automatic pistol was used.
The perpetrator opened fire inside the Wedgwood Baptist Church during a prayer rally, killing seven and wounding seven more.  A high-capacity semi-automatic pistol was among the weaponry used.

The perpetrator went on a shooting spree through two day-trading firms. He started at the All-Tech Investment Group, where he worked, then went on to Momentum Securities.  A total of nine were killed and 13 wounded.  A high-capacity semi-automatic pistol was among the weaponry used.
The perpetrator opened fire at a supermarket, killing four and injuring one.
The perpetrators opened fire at their high school, killing 13, and injuring 21.  A high-capacity semi-automatic pistol was among the weaponry used.
The perpetrator opened fire at an auto parts store, then walked down to a nearby school and continued shooting there.
The perpetrators ambushed students and teachers as they left school after one of the perpetrators pulled a fire alarm.  Five were killed and ten were wounded.
The perpetrator gunned down four bosses over a salary dispute.  A high-capacity semi-automatic pistol was used.
A former Caltrans employee opened fire at a maintenance yard after he was fired for allegedly selling government materials hed stolen from work, killing four and injuring two others.
Perpetrator shot and killed four former business partners at their workplace.
The perpetrator opened fire at the R.E. Phelon Company in retaliation for being fired after an argument with a supervisor, killing four and injuring three.

The perpetrator killed two police officers precipitated by a traffic stop, then drove in a stolen police cruiser to a building and killed an attorney and a newspaper editor there.  Three other people were wounded in the ensuing chase. A high-capacity semi-automatic rifle was used.
A firefighter killed his wife at home, then went to his workplace and killed four co-workers and wounded three others. Two high-capacity semi-automatic pistols were among the weaponry used.
The perpetrator opened fire on former co-workers inside their municipal trailer in an act of revenge after failing a drug test, killing five and injuring one.
The perpetrator opened fire at his workplace, killing four co-workers. A high-capacity semi-automatic pistol was used.
A disgruntled ex-employee opened fire at the Walter Rossler Company where he had worked, killing six.

column15: Perpetrator drove his ex-wife to a trucking company and shot and killed her and her reputed boyfriend. He then followed another employee to another store and shot him there, then went to a private home and shot two more people
column16: Two of five killed were killed in private home

column15: The perpetrator killed his wife and two neighbors in their homes, then went on a rampage through town, killing two more people and wounding ten others. Two high-capacity semi-automatic rifles were among the weaponry used
column16: Three of five killed were killed in private homes

column15: Perpetrator shot and killed eight people and wounded one during a football watching party in a private home. A high-capacity semi-automatic rifle was among the weapons used.
column16: All victims were killed at a party in a private home

column15: The perpetrator killed three family members in their home, then shot and killed two more people during a 180 mile long drive.
column16: Three of five killed were killed in private home

column15: The perpetrator shot and killed seven family members and one sheriffs deputy in three private homes.
column16: All eight victims were killed in private homes

column15: The perpetrator shot and killed four family members in three private homes.
column16: All four victims were killed in private homes

column15: The perpetrator shot and killed three people in a private group home, set fire to the home and killed himself.  A fourth person died in the blaze.
column16: All four of the victims were killed in a private residence

column15: Perpetrator opened fire at a family camping on private land, killing five.  He also beat one other person to death.
column16: All victims were shot on private land

column15: The perpetrator shot and killed three people in a private home, then shot a social worker in an office.
column16: Three of the four victims were killed in a private home

column15: The perpetrator opened fire in various private homes, killing seven and wounding three.
column16: All seven victims were killed in private homes

column15: Perpetrator killed several family members in their homes at several locations
column16: All six victims were killed in private homes

column15: The perpetrator fatally shot four people at three different locations: a business rival at his towing company, his ex-girlfriend and her new boyfriend in their shared home, and his cousin at his home.
column16: Three of the four victims were killed in private homes

column15: After stabbing three people, the perpetrator then went on a driving shooting spree, killing three, and wounding seven.
column16: Only three killed by gunfire (rest of fatalities were stabbed in private home)

column15: The perpetrator fatally shot his mother, his aunt, two acquaintances, and a store clerk in a spree of attacks before being captured by police.  He killed the first four victims in their respective homes and the final one –the clerk –at Alis Market on W. Moore Avenue, apparently in an attempt to rob the store.
column16: Four of five victims were killed in private homes, and public incident involved a robbery attempt

column15: The perpetrator opened fire in two private homes, killing four and wounding four.
column16: All four victims were killed in private homes

column15: Perpetrator set fire to his apartment, then killed six people within the complex, one in the parking lot, and the others in their apartments. A high-capacity semi-automatic pistol was used.
column16: Only one killed in pubic, five others killed in private homes

column15: The perpetrator killed two at his home, then went on a shooting spree, driving toward Santa Monica College campus, killing two more, and wounding two during the drive.  At the college he killed one other person outside the library. A high-capacity semi-automatic rifle was among the weaponry used.
column16: Two of five killed were killed in a private home

column15: The perpetrator shot and killed his girlfriend in their shared apartment, and then shot two witnesses in the buildings parking lot and a third victim in another apartment, before being killed by police.
column16: Two of the four killed were killed in private homes

column15: The perpetrator shot and killed four people in two private homes. A high-capacity semi-automatic pistol was used
column16: All four victims were killed in private homes

column15: The perpetrator fatally shot five people in a rural West Virginia home.  Fleeing from police, he shot and injured a gas station attendant and eventually fatally shot himself.
column16: All five victims were killed in a private home

column15: The perpetrator fatally shot seven people at two homes, including his exgirlfriend, wife, and their daughter. He also shot and wounded two other people while driving. A high-capacity semi-automatic pistol was used.
column16: All seven victims were killed in private homes

column15: Perpetrator killed his ex-wife and various acquaintances in private homes, and also shot a lawyer at his office.
column16: Four of the five victims were shot in private homes

column15: The perpetrator killed five people in two mobile homes, then went to his own home and shot himself.
column16: All five victims were killed in private homes

column15: Former employee opened fire at workplace, killing three and injuring two (one of the two injured died years later)
column16: Three killed day of shooting, fourth died years later

column15: The perpetrator opened fire in two private homes, killing four.
column16: All four victims were killed in private homes

column15: Perpetrator opened fire at police during a traffic stop, killing two. Another two police officers were killed and another injured in the home to which the perpetrator fled.  A high-capacity semi-automatic rifle was among the weapons used.
column16: Two of the four people killed were shot in a private home

column15: Perpetrator shot eight family members and acquaintances at three different private homes (killing seven), then shot and killed three other people while driving, and wounded five others. A high-capacity semi-automatic rifle was among the weaponry used
column16: Seven of the ten killed were killed in private homes

column15: Perpetrator killed a co-worker and a bystander in a hospital parking lot and wounded another, then drove to another co-worker's home and killer her and her husband.
column16: Two of the four people killed were killed in a private home

column15: The perpetrator killed five and wounded one in several private homes, then wounded two more and killed one while driving.
column16: Five of the six killed were killed in private homes

column15: Perpetrator opened fire inside an apartment after an argument at a private party, killing six and injuring one.  A high-capacity semi-automatic rifle was used.
column16: All victims were shot at a party in a private home

column15: Perpetrator first killed two women in their homes, then went to his workplace and killed two others and injured another
column16: Two of the four killed were killed in private homes

column15: Perpetrator opened fire at a private party, killing six and injuring two. The perpetrator did not know anyone at the party, but had been invited there.
column16: All victims were shot at a party in a private home

column15: Perpetrator attacked a deputy at a court house, beating her and stealing her weapon. He then shot and killed two in the courthouse, and another person as he left.  Another person was killed later that evening in a private home.
column16: One of the four victims was killed in a private home

column15: Perpetrator shot and killed six several hunters and wounded two others on private land after a verbal altercation, and potentially after the other party had fired shots. A high-capacity semi-automatic rifle was used.
column16: Altercation occured on private land between two sets of armed people.

column15: Perpetrator killed several neighbours and a police chief in three private homes, and also wounded one. A high-capacity semi-automatic rifle was used.
column16: All five of the victims were killed in private homes

column15: Perpetrator killed four people in private homes
column16: All four of the victims were killed in private homes

column15: The perpetrator opened fire in a parking lot, then walked from home to home in a trailer park shooting. Shot and killed four people and wounded three others.
column16: Two of the four victims were shot on private property

column15: A firefighter killed his wife in his home and set fire to the house.  When his co-workers and police arrived at the scene, he opened fire, killing three more people and injuring one.
column16: One of the four killed was killed in a private home

column15: The perpetrator shot and killed his mother-in-law in her home, then entered a church and killed his wife and son, killing one other person and wounding four more.
column16: One of the four killed was killed in a private home

column15: The perpetrator, a freshman at Thurston High, went on a shooting spree, killing his parents at home and two students at school, wounding 25 others.  A high-capacity semi-automatic pistol was among the weaponry used.
column16: Two of the four killed were killed in a private home

column15: Perpetrator killed four acquaintances and wounded two others in three private homes.
column16: All four victims were shot in private homes
